title: Scallops and prawns with ham butter and peas and broad beans
description: A decadent barbecue feast that is sure to impress.Equipment: You will need a small plank of untreated hard wood such as cherry, apple or oak, soaked in water for 30 minutes that fits in a barbecue, and a lidded barbecue.
ingredients: 1 courgette, ½ cut into ribbons and ½ into rounds
1 Little Gem lettuce, cut into quarters, core removed
400g/14oz large raw prawns, peeled and halved
